subject: Physical Fitness
title: Sleep Can't Be Banked
description: A quick win: understand Sleep Can't Be Banked.

hook.text: Sleep extra this weekend to make up for the week. It sounds reasonable â€” but sleep debt doesn't work that way.

buildup.text: Chronic sleep deprivation accumulates cognitive and physical deficits that a single long sleep can't erase.

discovery.text: Studies show recovery from one week of poor sleep takes multiple nights of adequate sleep, not just one binge.

twist.text: Sleeping in on weekends also disrupts your circadian rhythm, making Monday mornings feel worse.

climax.text: Consistent, adequate sleep every night beats the cycle of deprivation and catchup attempts.

punchline.text: You can't bank sleep or pay off debt in one night. Consistency wins.
